experiences.title: Backend developer
experiences.description: Responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining efficient and scalable backend services using Node.js, Express, and PostgreSQL technologies. I work with multidisciplinary teams using agile methodologies to integrate solutions that optimize system performance and functionality. I'm also responsible for API integration, database management, and the implementation of microservices-oriented architectures, ensuring high-quality development of innovative products.

experiences.title: Full-stack developer
experiences.description: Comprehensive development of web applications for a wide variety of projects and clients, implementing a wide range of technologies, from the frontend to the backend, ensuring the quality and efficiency of the solutions developed.

experiences.title: Tutor for diplomas in backend programming
experiences.organization: National University of Tres de Febrero
experiences.description: Pedagogical support for university students in the study of backend and full-stack programming, assistance in teaching classes, and grading assignments.

experiences.title: Backend developer
experiences.description: Development of a web application for a collaborative project in the Programador Promedio simulation environment.
